mainText:
I never met you, but I feel like i know you
You made devices that I did not need, but had to have
I made fun of those that would stand in line at Christmas for a sale, 
yet I stood in line for each iPhone and iPad
I neve met you, but I feel I lost someone important in my life.

Thank you Steve Jobs for giving me not what I need but what I want. My thoughts and prayers are with your family, friends and co-workers.
author: Jeff
